actions.text: Amendment SA 866 proposed by Senator Kyl to Amendment SA 849. (consideration: CR S4562-4563; text: CR S4563) To protect classified information.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 866 proposed by Senator Kyl to Amendment SA 849.

amends_amendment.purpose: To amend chapter 113B of title 18, United States Code, to prohibit the recruitment of persons to participate in terrorism, to provide remedies for immigration litigation, and to amend the Immigration and Nationality Act to modify the requirements related to judicial review of visa revocation and to modify the requirements related to detention and removal of aliens ordered removed.
